original_text: “We can’t,” they replied, “until all the flocks are gathered and the stone has been rolled away from the mouth of the well. Then we will water the sheep.”
korean_text: 그들이 이르되 우리가 그리하지 못하겠노라 떼가 다 모이고 목자들이 우물 아귀에서 돌을 옮겨야 우리가 양에게 물을 먹이느니라

sentences.original_text: until all the flocks are gathered
and the stone has been rolled away
from the mouth of the well
Then we will water the sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 우리는 양에게 물을 줄 것입니다
